plan_title: NBP community launches CryptoPunks avatar incentive plan
upload_intro: Complete tasks to get NBPPunks NFT
claim_intro: All the users can only accept vaild invation for once. To claim platform equity NFT 'Rare_Ki social', you need to follow Twitter and join Telegram community.
amount-tip: Invite at least 10 users to consume NBP to directly increase the level
copy_invitation_text: Share millions of $, and claim limited social NFT for free. NFTBomb invitation link:
upload_tip: File types supported: JPG, PNG. Max size: 3 MB
stake.bannerTitle:
NBP community launches
CryptoPunks avatar incentive plan
stake.bannerDesc:
After obtaining the pure community CryptoPunks avatar, you can pledge your NFT avatar to the fund pool (on BSC chain)
Obtain fund incentives from 1,000,000 NBP.
stake.infoTitle: Stake NBPPunks NFT to earn NBP
stake.infoDesc: The official opening time of the fund pool is 2021-12-13 (0:00 UCT), which will produce 10,000 NBP per day (0:00 UTC), and all pledged NFTs will be divided equally(NFT can be staked only by one piece). When the NFT avatar is injected into the fund pool, there will be a 24-hour vacancy period, skipping the current round of NBP output. The NFT avatar and NBP can be taken out at any time, and can only be taken out at the same time.
combiningPlan.title: Combining plan
combiningPlan.intro: Synthetic Rare_Ki Plan: A Rare_Ki Punks NFT can be synthesized by 25 Rare_Ki Social NFTs and 3,000 NBP which will be sent to a blackhole address. The Rare_Ki Punks NFT holders can join the NBP Punks Incentive Fund.
combiningPlan.OKTitle: You have obtained Rare_Ki Punks NFT, you can participate in the NBPPunks fund pool
